text: Python is named after Monty Python, not the snake.
The first website went live in 1991.
The first computer virus was created in 1986.
The first programmer was Ada Lovelace.
The first computer bug was an actual moth stuck in a machine.
JavaScript was created in 10 days.
The first hard disk could hold 5MB of data.
The first email was sent in 1971.
The first computer mouse was made of wood.
Linux was created by Linus Torvalds in 1991.
Google was originally called Backrub.
The first webcam monitored a coffee pot.
The original name for Windows was Interface Manager.
The first video game was created in 1958.
HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language.
CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.
Python is one of the top 3 programming languages in 2025.
The first Apple computer was built in a garage.
The first smartphone was IBM Simon, released in 1994.
The first domain name ever registered was symbolics.com.
Google's first storage was made of LEGO bricks.
The first computer virus for Windows was called 'WinVir'.
The first computer game character was a pixelated dot.
C++ was created by Bjarne Stroustrup.
The first programming language was Fortran.
The first webcam image was of a coffee pot at Cambridge.
The first Apple logo featured Isaac Newton.
The first web browser was called WorldWideWeb.
The first 'emoji' was created in 1999 by Shigetaka Kurita.
The first YouTube video was uploaded in 2005.
The first tweet was sent by Jack Dorsey in 2006.
The first virus spread via floppy disks.
The first operating system was GM-NAA I/O.
The first text message was sent in 1992.
The first cloud service was launched in 2006.
The first computer language compiler was created in 1952.
The first microprocessor was Intel 4004.
The first graphical user interface was developed at Xerox PARC.
The first web server was CERN httpd.
The first email spam was sent in 1978.
The first smartphone had a touchscreen.
The first Wi-Fi protocol was 802.11b.
The first computer to beat a human in chess was Deep Blue.
The first game console was Magnavox Odyssey.
The first video uploaded online was 'Me at the zoo'.
The first digital camera was made in 1975.
The first IBM PC used MS-DOS.
The first computer virus in the wild was Brain.
The first emoji set had 176 icons.
The first Apple iPhone was released in 2007.
